models.classes

Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.classes.Castle

  • public class Castle
extends java.lang.Object
    A player's Castle. It is the central piece of the Player's Board. Each Player has only one Castle. Each one has an unique Position and PlayerColor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Castle(PlayerColor color, Position position)
      Creates a Castle with the specified color and position.
